title: Review deleted code from cleanup phase
description:
Audit the code that was deleted during the aggressive cleanup:
1. main.web.rs - was this truly unused?
2. Debug command infrastructure - verify these aren't needed
3. Debug implementation functions - check if any are still referenced
4. Terminal run() function - confirm only WASM is used

Ensure nothing critical was removed that breaks game functionality.

title: Add WASM integration tests
description:
Create tests to verify:
1. WASM module loads without errors
2. Game initialization (create()) succeeds
3. Game loop functions work (step, feed, get_updates)
4. Save/load functionality works
5. Undo/redo operations work

This is critical for beta stability - we cannot ship without verifying the core game engine actually works.

title: Simplify terminal control bar CSS
description: The TerminalControls component has evolved through multiple CSS approaches. Consolidate color styling, clarify the light background issue, and ensure the theme colors resolve correctly. Consider moving complex color logic to CSS variables or a dedicated stylesheet.
